permissions.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
permissions.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
permissions.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
permissions.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
permissions.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
permissions.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
permissions.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
permissions.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
permissions.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
permissions.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
permissions.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
permissions.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
permissions.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
permissions.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
permissions.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
